titleStmt.title: A Magyar Országgyűlés Korpusza ParlaMint-HU [ParlaMint.ana SAMPLE]
Hungarian parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-HU [ParlaMint.ana SAMPLE]
A Magyar Országgyűlés ülései, 7. és 8. ciklus (2014 - 2020)
Minutes of the National Assembly of Hungary, Term 7 and 8 (2014 - 2020)

funder.orgName: Társadalomtudományi Kutatóközpont, Eötvös Loránd Kutatási Hálózat
Centre for Social Sciences, Eötvös Loránd Research Network

availability.p: Ez a munka az alábbi licence alapján használható Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: A Magyar Országgyűlés ülései
Minutes of the National Assembly of Hungary

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the Parla-CLARIN recommendations and covering the COVID-19 pandemic from November 2019 as well as the earlier period from 2015 to serve as a reference corpus; (2) process the corpora linguistically to add Universal Dependencies syntactic structures and Named Entity annotation; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers and Parlameter; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

correction.p: No correction of source texts was performed.

normalization.p: Normalisation was performed only on the meta-data, e.g. person names.

hyphenation.p: No end-of-line hyphens were present in the source.

quotation.p: Quotation marks have been left in the text and are not explicitly marked up.

segmentation.p: The texts are segmented into utterances (speeches) and segments (corresponding to paragraphs in the source transcription).

category.catDesc: Legislative period: term of the parliament between general elections.

Legislative session: the period of time in which a legislature is convened for purpose of lawmaking, usually being one of two or more smaller divisions of the entire time between two elections. A session is a meeting or series of connected meetings devoted to a single order of business, program, agenda, or announced purpose.
Meeting: Each meeting may be a separate session or part of a group of meetings constituting a session. The session/meeting may take one or more days.
Regular: a regular speaker at a meeting
Guest: a guest speaker at a meeting
acl: Clausal modifier of noun (adjectival clause)
advmod:locy: Adverbial modifier: relation between an adverb answering for the question „where?” and its parent.
advmod:mode: Adverbial modifier: relation between other adverbs and their parents
advmod:que: Adverbial modifier between the Verb, and the question suffix -e “whether”.
advmod:tfrom: Adverbial modifier: relation between an adverb answering for the question „from when?” and its parent
advmod:tlocy: Adverbial modifier: relation between an adverb answering for the question „when?” and its parent
advmod:to: Adverbial modifier: relation between an adverb answering for the question „where to?” and its parent
advmod:tto: Adverbial modifier: relation between an adverb answering for the question „till when or by when?” and its parent
amod:att: Adjectival modifier: adverbial uses of adjectives
amod:mode: Adjectival modifier: adverbial uses of adjectives
amod:obl: Adjectival modifier: adverbial uses of adjectives
compound: Relation between verb and preverb
compound:preverb: Relation between verb and preverb
nmod:att: Nominal modifier: nominal modifier without postposition
obj:lvc: Object: object of a light verb
orphan: Relation between Adjective and Noun

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to elements giving their name. In this document they are simply local references into the UD-SYN taxonomy categories in the corpus root TEI header.

application.label: UDPipe
application.desc: Tokenisation, sentence segmentation, UD morphological features assignment and dependency parsing with UDPipe, available from https://lindat.mff.cuni.cz/services/udpipe/.

application.label: Magyarlanc linguistic toolikt
application.desc: MSD tagging and lemmatisation with magyarlanc linguistic toolkit, available from https://rgai.inf.u-szeged.hu/magyarlanc.

application.label: NER system for Hungarian
application.desc: Named entity recognition with NER recognizer tool, trained for Hungarian and available at https://rgai.inf.u-szeged.hu/node/109.
